name: Almost Endless
description:
All defective machines are disposed of in the Bottomless Pit. After a thorough investigation over some noise complaints, we have recently realized that the Pit isn't actually bottomless, and it shall be referred to as the Almost Bottomless Pit from now on.

Take care of the machines.

Controls:

WASD to move/Mouse Click to shoot

R to roll the dice for a buff, for 25% of your health.

Credits:

Yvette Kooke - Environment Art

Zerozenses - Enemy/Weapon Models and Animations

Me - Everything else
